sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
  PageContainer,
  ContentContainer1,
  ContentContainer2,
  Title,
  SubContainer,
  Box,
  TextBody,
} from "./styles/about_style.js";
import Card from "../components/card";

function About() {
  return (
    <>
      <PageContainer>
        <ContentContainer1>
          <Title>Building Tomorrow's Maritime Frontier</Title>
        </ContentContainer1>
        <ContentContainer2>
          <SubContainer>
            <Box>Vision</Box>
            <TextBody>
              We’re focused on scaling access to mission-critical maritime data.
              As a team of watch officers, veterans, and software engineers, our
              experience illuminated the challenges of the maritime environment
              and the need to operate with data-driven insights - at the ship
              and watch floor level.
            </TextBody>
          </SubContainer>
          <SubContainer>
            <Box>Approach</Box>
            <TextBody>
              Today’s enterprise software overlooks vast amounts of data
              generated by ships across the sea. Watch officers, with
              significant responsibility in their hands, are left to make
              high-stakes judgment calls without software that serves them the
              most relevant information. Marview is building an answer: our
              platform fuses open-source data and interfaces with existing
              sensors throughout the maritime network, offering key, actionable
              insights on a single screen. We’re committed to the opportunities
              presented by an explosion in satellite bandwidth, open-source data
              streams, and maritime sensor capabilities. The maritime domain is
              too important, and too challenging, to rely on analog methods any
              longer.
            </TextBody>
          </SubContainer>
        </ContentContainer2>
      </PageContainer>
    </>
  );
}

export default About;
